description: Consider the tree of triples P(n, k) with n > 0 and 0 < k <= 3^(n-1), such that P(1, 1) = [3; 4; 5] and each triple t on some row branches to the triples A*t, B*t, C*t on the next row (with A = [1, -2, 2; 2, -1, 2; 2, -2, 3], B = [1, 2, 2; 2, 1, 2; 2, 2, 3] and C = [-1, 2, 2; -2, 1, 2; -2, 2, 3]); T(n, k) is the third component of P(n, k).
